name: All-Dressed Fries Seasoning
summary: When you can’t decide on a flavour, we say, have ‘em all! All Dressed is a classic Canadian chip seasoning and we’ve put an epic twist on it. Salt & vinegar, ketchup, sour cream & onion, and BBQ are all here in one amazingly tasty, zero sodium blend. You’re going to want to shake this on fries, homemade chips, popcorn, potato salad, and more!
